pages.text: $(l)What's Nekoration?$()$(br)$(#FF9900)Nekoration$() is a mod adding lots of decorational stuff to Minecraft, making building and decorating easier and more joyful.$(br2)The name $(#FF9900)Nekoration$() is a compound of $(#00BEFF)cat$() in Japanese(ねこ, neko) and $(#FFD200)decoration$(), suggesting that the mod is both $(#BD00FF)ornamental$() and $(#00E07E)cats-friendly$()... Meow~ ^._.^= ∫
